author: georgep
msg: TS-15: The chanages are a modified patch of 'fix-nobody-user.patch' submitted by 'mturk@apache.org' and updates TrafficCop.cc and RecordsConfig.cc also. By default the $pkgsysuser and $pkgsysgroup is the current user doing the build. To enable a different system user and group use the '-with-user=<newuser>' and '-with-group=<newgroup>' options with 'configure'.
